author: neilg
msg: rename recently-introduced method to more appropriately reflect what it does

author: sandygao
msg: Fixing bug 21038: when an identity constraint field is invalid,
sometimes we add the same IDValue to the hashtable again and again,
leading the parser into infinite loop.

author: mrglavas
msg: Preliminary support for XInclude submitted by Peter McCracken. It supports: regular/text includes, fallbacks, namespace fix-up, etc...

author: elena
msg: The preliminary implementation of XInclude submitted by Peter McCracken.
It supports most normal functions: regular includes, text includes,
fallbacks, namespace fix-up, etc, and it should be okay for regular use.
The main functionality that is currently missing:
- Fix-up of unparsed entities and notations.
- Encoding of included documents when parse="text".

author: jdcasey
msg: Renaming two mojos named *Plugin, and adding APT doco.
